gr.athenainnovation.imis.fusion.gis.core

Class Importer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.athenainnovation.imis.fusion.gis.core.Importer

  • public class Importer
extends Object
    Provides the infrastructure for the export of metadata and geometric triples from a dataset with a given SPARQL endpoint and their loading into a PostGIS db using an instance of PostGISImporter.
    Author:
    Thomas Maroulis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Importer(DBConfig dBConfig, ImporterWorker callback)
      Constructs a new instance of the importer with the given PostGISImporter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clean()
      Clean-up.
      void importGeometries(int datasetIdent, Dataset sourceDataset)
      This method fetches all triples with a subject matching parameter subjectRegex and a two triple chain with a predicate matching HAS_GEOMETRY_REGEX in the first triple and AS_WKT_REGEX in the second triple.
      void importMetadata(int datasetIdent, Dataset sourceDataset)
      This method fetches all triples with a subject matching parameter subjectRegex and a predicate not matching HAS_GEOMETRY_REGEX.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Importer

        public Importer(DBConfig dBConfig,
        ImporterWorker callback)
         throws SQLException
        Constructs a new instance of the importer with the given PostGISImporter.
        Parameters:
        dBConfig - database configuration
        callback - callback
        Throws:
        SQLException
        RuntimeException - in case of an unrecoverable error. The cause of the error will be encapsulated by the thrown RuntimeException

    • Method Detail

      • importMetadata

        public void importMetadata(int datasetIdent,
                  Dataset sourceDataset)
                    throws SQLException
        This method fetches all triples with a subject matching parameter subjectRegex and a predicate not matching HAS_GEOMETRY_REGEX. Those triples are then imported into a PostGIS database using an instance of PostGISImporter.
        Parameters:
        datasetIdent - PostGISImporter.DATASET_A for dataset A or PostGISImporter.DATASET_B for dataset B
        sourceDataset - source dataset from which to extract triples
        Throws:
        SQLException
        RuntimeException - in case of an unrecoverable error. The cause of the error will be encapsulated by the thrown RuntimeException

      • importGeometries

        public void importGeometries(int datasetIdent,
                    Dataset sourceDataset)
                      throws SQLException
        This method fetches all triples with a subject matching parameter subjectRegex and a two triple chain with a predicate matching HAS_GEOMETRY_REGEX in the first triple and AS_WKT_REGEX in the second triple. Those triples are then imported into a PostGIS database using an instance of PostGISImporter.
        Parameters:
        datasetIdent - PostGISImporter.DATASET_A for dataset A or PostGISImporter.DATASET_B for dataset B
        sourceDataset - source dataset from which to extract triples
        Throws:
        SQLException
        RuntimeException - in case of an unrecoverable error. The cause of the error will be encapsulated by the thrown RuntimeException

      • clean

        public void clean()
        Clean-up. Close held resources.
